conditions_text_1: The stock displayed on our website is indicative and not guaranteed.
conditions_text_2: We strive to keep information up to date, but errors may occur, especially due to returns of equipment or repair delays.
conditions_text_3: After confirming your order, we will confirm its availability within 48 hours. If a product is out of stock, we will offer you an alternative or proceed with the cancellation, with your consent.
conditions_text_4: Required documents: A valid ID and proof of address less than 2 months old are mandatory. Without these documents, the rental will be refused.
Garantie financi√®re Une caution peut √™: Financial Guarantee: A deposit may be required, paid through bank authorization via the Wikli platform.
Mat√©riel de haute valeur Pour une valeu: High-Value Equipment: For equipment worth over ‚Ç¨2,500, two IDs are required.
Retour et restitution Si le mat√©riel re: Return and Refund: If the equipment is returned in good condition, the deposit will be refunded immediately (95% of the cases). In case of damage, an assessment within 48 hours will determine the necessary repairs.
R√©parations Vous pouvez confier les r√©: Repairs: You can entrust the repairs to Guy Location Events or choose a provider within 5 days. Please note, if repairs take 5 days, the equipment will be charged for 5 days of rental.
Les dur√©es de location sont fix√©es dan: The rental periods are set in the contract. Any delay in return will be charged at the rate of an additional day per day of delay.
Nous garantissons le bon fonctionnement: We guarantee the proper functioning of the equipment. If needed, an after-sales service is available in √éle-de-France within 4 hours. It is recommended to install the equipment at least 4 hours before use to allow for intervention in case of malfunction.
Si le d√©placement √©tait du √† une mauv: If the travel was due to incorrect installation or misuse of the equipment, it will be charged 90.00‚Ç¨ including tax.
Guy Location √âv√©nements veille √† ce q: Guy Location √âv√©nements ensures that all equipment made available to you is carefully checked and maintained in accordance with current safety standards. In case of a problem with one of the devices during the service, and if the renter has not made any improper handling, the rental fee for the affected device will be fully refunded.
Les installations effectu√©es par le loc: Installations carried out by the renter, which are not supervised by professionals, must be carefully performed and placed away from passage areas. The renter has the option to check the condition of the equipment in their presence before taking it. If this verification is not carried out, the renter's acceptance of the general rental conditions will be considered as recognition of the guarantees offered by Guy Location Events in order to prevent any risk of structure falls or damages.
Le mat√©riel ne peut √™tre sous-lou√© ou: The equipment cannot be subleased or transferred without our written consent. It must not be used for illegal purposes or contrary to good morals, nor outdoors without authorization from the competent authorities.
La location sera r√©alis√©e au tarif ind: The rental will be carried out at the rate indicated on the Guy Location Events website at the time of booking. Prices may be changed without notice. An invoice will be issued upon confirmation of your booking. If prices are adjusted after the invoice is issued, it will not be modified retroactively.
Toute annulation effectu√©e plus de 72 h: Any cancellation made more than 72 hours before the start of the rental will result in a cancellation fee equal to 40% of the total rental amount.
Nous ne pouvons √™tre responsables des r: We cannot be held responsible for delays or cancellations due to unforeseen events such as a strike or a natural disaster. A refund or rescheduling solution may be considered depending on the situation analysis.
Le locataire est responsable en cas de p: The renter is responsible in case of loss or theft of the equipment. They must reimburse its replacement value based on the current catalog price.
Il incombe au locataire de souscrire une: It is the renter's responsibility to take out insurance to cover the risks of damage, loss, or theft during the rental period. We decline all responsibility in case of an incident not covered by this insurance.
Le mat√©riel sera inspect√© d√®s son ret: The equipment will be inspected upon return. Any non-compliance, such as damages or dirt requiring specific cleaning, will be charged to the renter. If a service provider is not chosen within 2 working days, the company will carry out the repairs and charge the fees.
En cas de litige, nous nous engageons √†: In case of a dispute, we commit to seeking an amicable solution. If an agreement is not found, the dispute will be brought before the competent court located at our headquarters.
En signant le contrat de location le loc: By signing the rental contract, the renter acknowledges having read and accepted these general rental conditions without reservation.
